title: Riot - Can we please get a Harrowing Summoner Rift this year?
body: I know your working hard on the new rune system but a Harrowing Summoner Rift would be nice and much appreciated.

replies.body:
Please God, yes. I've missed this thing. It's one of those things they did for us what seems like ages ago, and it meant quite a bit to me-lots of little interesting quirks on the map. I LOVED IT, and miss it.

Riot, bring it back!

I highly doubt Riot will be able to create a new map texture, new skins, compose music, and do some extra harrowing event in under 2 months
That is of course if they are already planning it
I mean they did it for Blood Moon, so I don't see why it's not possible for Harrowing.

> I know your working hard on the new rune system

Nearly sure the rift would be handled by different team, so it doesn't matter they are also doing runes. Not sure If icon graphic team or gameplay team or programming team has anything to do with modeling and textures.
Yes please, I'd love a shadow isles themed SR!

Darn ya! Ya beat me to it.
I'd love seeing that too, but I think they'll just use the Autumn Rift that was used during the Teemo'ing.
How are those two things at all related...?

Doom bots were one of my fave mods. I personally LOVE Halloween, and the rift, with the night theme, and the eerie music was so amazing. I always looked forward to the Harrowing skins and themes and was so disheartened when it all stopped.
Twisted Treeline Hexakill would be much appreciated too.
Wasn't the Teemowabohu Summoners Rift for Harrowing?
It was but he's talking about how there used to be an old harrowing map for summoners rift - perhaps getting something like that again - and not the skins and doom bots event.
With all the map skins they've had and the Christmas one we had last year I wouldn't be surprised at all if they were already working on it.
They actually had one WAYYYYYYY back, it was a very comfy looking map.
I know and they also had a comfy looking winter rift before but made a new one because the summoner rift got updated. So i hope they will make a new Harrowing summoner rift, this year.
Probably won't look as good either, considering how modern Snowy Rift and Blood Moon Rift looked...
I personally wouldnt care at all if there werent one.

Hope it's not just the lame minion change of skin, I want the full map to change and for people who say it will take then a long time forgot they had 3 years to do this ever since the map texture change. We got a X mas now we need a Halloween map.
